metadata.title: CVE-2021-21408 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Smarty is a template engine for PHP, facilitating the separation ofpresentation (HTML/CSS) from application logic. Prior to versions 3.1.43and 4.0.3, template authors could run restricted static php methods. Usersshould upgrade to version 3.1.43 or 4.0.3 to receive a patch.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-21408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.21-1ubuntu1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.21-1ubuntu1+esm1').
